definition: to be ahead of one's time/to surpass or outdo one's predecessors/to be ahead of the pack/to take the lead/advanced
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to aim in front of a moving target

sentences.english: Having fewer children to accomplish emissions reduction, it is really a topic ahead of its time.
sentences.chinese: 從少生孩子入手談減排，這真是一個很超前的話題。

sentences.english: There is obviously a sense of priorities that we do not understand.
sentences.chinese: 這種明顯的超前意識我們無法明白。

sentences.english: Gordon Wu won recognition for his progressive ideas of development a long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 胡應湘在工程和發展的超前理念，早獲肯定。

sentences.english: Advanced consciousness is leading cadre's necessary quality in new times.
sentences.chinese: 超前意識是新時代裏領導幹部必備的素質。

sentences.english: But even with those added parts, I was ahead of the game cost-wise.
sentences.chinese: 但即使有這些增加的部分，我是超前的遊戲成本方面。

sentences.english: The problem was that Duan's plan was ahead of its time, while official policy at the time still lagged behind.
sentences.chinese: 段祺華的想法過於超前，而當時的政策仍然滯後。

sentences.english: Maybe Hera was ahead of her time after all.
sentences.chinese: 或許赫拉終究還是太超前於她的時代了。

sentences.english: Please be careful not to bump into, push or move ahead of others in the queue. Also, the entire party must wait together.
sentences.chinese: 請不要推撞或擠擁其他來賓，也請勿超前或插隊。

sentences.english: Conclusion Promethazine has the effect of preemptive analgesia.
sentences.chinese: 結論異丙嗪具有超前鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: Take advantage of an opportunity and be and strategic lead is faddish and consistent style actually.
sentences.chinese: 順勢而爲和戰略超前實際上是風行一貫的作風。

sentences.english: This increase of steel price in China has been mainly caused by the exceeding domestic steel consumption.
sentences.chinese: 鋼材漲價主要是國內鋼材超前消費所致。

sentences.english: Sometimes doing things must have an advanced consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 有時候做事必須有超前意識。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether promethazine has the effect of preemptive analgesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究異丙嗪是否具有超前鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: Overconsuming has been in vogue nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 超前消費已成爲當今的時髦。

sentences.english: But in one area, greenery might be taken to excess.
sentences.chinese: 但有一個領域的綠色環保行爲可能太過超前。

sentences.english: At some point I may rush to catch up ahead.
sentences.chinese: 有的方面我會急着想要超前。

definition: to fall behind the ranks/to be outdated
lit. new bud/fig. new and original
old-fashioned/out of date/to be later than the time stipulated or agreed upon
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
